name: LightShroom
description:
In this short metroidvania you're playing as one of the last of the rarest species of mushrooms, The LightShroom. You're set out to save the last ones of your kind left, and to do so you must kill the mechanical hydra. Funnily enough, you'll do it with her own weapon - electricity, and also a good old sword. Charge up by hitting enemies with the sword and release the charge using a lightning bolt!

The game includes 3 rather small areas, with each having a unique song and a bossfight!


fun fact: I accidentally left in a thing to skip 90% of the game in the first version but it's now fixed
